website_summaries.verdict: This is a great choice for business needs. Good processor and sleek design.
pros: A great 2-in-1 laptop that offers great speed with 16GB of RAM and an Intel Core i7 processor
Combines a large 15.6-inch screen with a compact design
cons: Some applications will push the limits of this laptop

customer_reviews.title: Bad USB Port/ hardware problems
customer_reviews.text: Caution: be wary of purchasing this computer. Major hardware problems occurred when trying to set up. After several hours-long calls with Dell technical support I was told the issue was with a damaged motherboard, so I had to return it. Curious to know if this issue has been a widespread problem with this model, I suggest looking into it before considering a purchase. Huge headache and disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: R.F.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, its okay. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Meh, its okay, the battery goes down pretty fast. I do have some graphic software running and youtube, so Im sure that affects it, but i was hoping the battery would be more durable. The audio has an issue with the headphones, it makes a crackling noise , the speakers are fine, the the headphone settings are just weird. i guess for the price, you get what you pay for. // Several months later the audio seemed to fix itself, there was a prompt asking what type of headphones to use, so thats good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fast, quiet and light
customer_reviews.text: I use this computer for work, documents, spreadsheets, network analysis, graphics, and creating videos. The computer is all that I'd hoped it would be, except for the built-in monitor. Very low quality and somewhat disappointed with it. I should've paid double and got the Dell Alienware for the better video quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Modlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop, but Ran Into Hardware Issues
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is high quality. Display is excellent and high definition, and the SSD makes it lightning fast for loading and booting up. Wish I could give it 5 stars, but I ran into a hardware issue with the fan about two months after my purchase, and had to send it in to Dell for a replacement. Apparently this is a common issue. If you buy, get a warranty and you'll be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Speed. DVR r/w.
customer_reviews.text: More laptop than I need, I had a Dell i3, i5 that crashed under warranty. But I wanted an i7. Thought that it had a fingerprint reader but it does not. Not a deal breaker for me. Still learning all of the features but so far I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Issue with this laptop which is new: Battery keeps draining in Sleep Mode
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I purchased this laptop days ago, I'm happy with it except that the battery keeps draining when laptop is either Hibernating or in Sleep Mode, this is a big issue since I use it when I travel and then the battery will die while I'm traveling and when is not plugged. Any idea on how to fix this? I would love to keep it but as you will understand I can't keep if this issue can't be solved. Hope you can help, thank you. I've made some research and tried different things but nothing has worked
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money on this product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this laptop Dec 9 2019 for my wife to continue college. The computer reboots in the middle of notes, tests, and lectures with out warning. Tech teams can't fix the problem. Don't waste your time or money on this product. Especially if you are a college student already struggling to make ends meet.
customer_reviews.author: Davonte

customer_reviews.title: Complete Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Blue screen and hardware crashes one month into use and they persist. Dell support is useless. DO NOT BUY THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.author: Lunar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful laptop  Great for medical office
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop to replace one of my nurses older dell laptop. What a wonderful surprise. My nurses are fighting over who gets to use this. Its sooo fast. The nurses can see dramatic productivity with this laptop. I will likely buy a few more I don't like fighting in the office LOL
customer_reviews.author: David Le

customer_reviews.title: Starts up fast!
customer_reviews.text: I love how fast this computer starts up, turn it on it comes right up in seconds. The touch screen is very responsive. Great laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Meab

customer_reviews.title: All USB ports were inoperable
customer_reviews.text: Non of the USB ports were usable. I could not plug any of them into the computer. It is as if they were left out when the machine was manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Spector

customer_reviews.title: Awesome notebook
customer_reviews.text: It's the better notebook i was bought and I'm so happy to receive it faster than I thought! Good display, good keyboard, excellent touch display, absolutly lovely design and faster as a expected!! Seller and product recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Very Disaapointed
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER WRITE REVIEWS but I feel like this one is necessary. I have owned many Dell computers and loved them but this one is terrible. It is constantly running hot and the USB ports never seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Legault

customer_reviews.title: Initial confusion but great resolution
customer_reviews.text: There was confusion on the product technical specifications. The retailer was very proactive and courteous, offering a mix of restitution options. I would definitely do business with them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: McEnerney, William-James

customer_reviews.title: Hard drive a few hrs after using
customer_reviews.text: Product only worked for a few hours and crashed with hard drive problems. I had to return it. Was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Seerajh B.

customer_reviews.title: functional and long lasting ,
customer_reviews.text: didn't realize that PC 365 came already loaded on the PC, ordered office suite home and business 2020 to add to my new computer. So far meeting or exceeding all my expectations. need to load a few games yet. no issues getting started.
customer_reviews.author: ZiggyPA

customer_reviews.title: easy to work with!
customer_reviews.text: good computer, a bit heavy, but nice design, and more importantly, fast to work with
customer_reviews.author: raquel romay

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for life
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is great, it is serving me very well.I needed it for League of legends and some design.It is working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikola V.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible - screen stopped working within the first month
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from PConline365 via Amazon. Horrible computer, horrible seller. The screen would go black and not work. We contacted the seller they said we needed to update the computer. Didn't change anything. Tried to register it with Dell and they said it was already registered to someone else. PConline365 tried to say they registered it, but they didn't have the login. Amazon gave me a full refund, but when PConline365 processed it they kept a restocking fee. Amazon reversed it. BEWARE if they say they register the SN for you.
customer_reviews.author: kiddos7
